name: Anarchy (itch)
description:
Venture into the ruins of a miraculous land in order to vengefully strike down the tyrannical dragon, Anarchist. Meet the victims of his oppression as you acquire useful abilities & build you courage.  Those daring enough might find solace in facing Anarchist first thing, reaping the reward of an ultimate hero.

Smack your way through the wildlife, Bounce on the forest's rich berries, Cling to the sticky walls of the clever caverns & Dash though the skies with your new found companion! Or if sight seeing isn't your thing, take down anarchist, post haste!

Watch out for Goody, an odd ball goblin. He will provide you with the challenges to complete in order to reach your peak boldness. Want to revisit an area, why not add some spice with Goody's speed run bonanza!
